snippet: BRAWARSKY--Muriel. Loving wife of the late Jack. Beloved mother of Phyllis (Noah), Diane (William), Sandee (Barry). Amazing bubbie and great-bubbie. Most devoted friend. Funeral Monday, May 2, Plaza Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Avenue (91st Street), 12:00pm. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BRAWARSKY--Muriel. Loving wife of the late Jack. Beloved mother of Phyllis (Noah), Diane (William), Sandee (Barry). Amazing bubbie and great-bubbie. Most devoted friend. Funeral Monday, May 2, Plaza Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Avenue (91st Street), 12:00pm. 1/3
